Title: Requires the commissioner of education to direct the resumption of school musical/theatrical performances during the COVID-19 pandemic
Summary: Requires the commissioner of education to direct the resumption of school musical/theatrical performances during the COVID-19 pandemic; requires proper safety protocols be put in place to enable the safe play of such school musical/theatrical performances.
ActClause: AN ACT relating to resuming the play of school musical/theatrical performances during the COVID-19 pandemic and requiring safety protocols to be put in place to enable safe play of such school musical/theatrical performances
